comment: Evening everyone ! Q1 / What's the one thing you're MOST proud of in your last year of running ? Share a photo if you have one and let's celebrate those achievements
amr:
# ::snt Evening everyone ! Q1 / What's the one thing you're MOST proud of in your last year of running ? Share a photo if you have one and let's celebrate those achievements
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / even-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (e2 / everyone))
      :snt2 (p / pride-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (a / amr-unknown)
            :time (y3 / year
                  :mod (l / last)
                  :time-of (r / run-02
                        :ARG0 y2)
                  :poss y2)
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 a
                  :ARG3 (m2 / most)))
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s / share-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y4 / you)
                  :ARG1 (p2 / photo)
                  :condition (h2 / have-03
                        :ARG0 y4
                        :ARG1 p2))
            :op2 (c / celebrate-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (a3 / achieve-01
                              :ARG0 y4)
                        :mod (t2 / that)))))

comment: Completed a few k races and even some on my own . But the best thing was getting my friend out running . He loves it .
amr:
# ::snt Completed a few k races and even some on my own . But the best thing was getting my friend out running . He loves it .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / complete-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / race-02
                        :quant (f / few)
                        :mod (k / k))
                  :op2 (r2 / race-02
                        :quant (s / some)
                        :mod (e / even)
                        :mod (b / by-oneself))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (g / get-05
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
                                    :ARG2 (f2 / friend)))
                        :ARG2 (o / out-06
                              :ARG1 p
                              :ARG2 (r3 / run-02
                                    :ARG0 p)))
                  :ARG2 (g2 / good-02
                        :ARG1 g)
                  :ARG3 (m2 / most)))
      :snt3 (l / love-01
            :ARG0 (h3 / he)
            :ARG1 (ii3 / it)))
